title: Is it ok to call your teammates dog shit or an ugly fuck?
body:
I got 14 days suspension due to calling an afk teammates dog shit, is it actually bannable tho cuz ive seen Tyler1 calling his teammates dog shit all the time, and hes honor level 4 now? 
Isnt it a double standard thing towards big streamers and normal league players?

Another thing would be what we supposed to do if we encounter soft inters or trolls, this problem been addressed for years where a troll could potentially holding other 4 teammates hostages. I even reported those trolls through tickets, and nothing happens to them at all. Howevere, here comes the fun part of it, if we somehow shit talk those trolls, we will get banned...
